info.desc: This is the sign and path leading to The McNamara Alumni Center leading north.
info.instr: Starting on the second floor of The Graduate Hotel, make your way to the middle of the north side of the building.

info.desc: What you will see upon entering McNamara.
info.instr: You should see a sign labelling the path to McNamara Alumni Center.
This leads to a straight path which you walk until you get to Level B of McNamara where there is an elevator and a staircase on each side.
